mapper.insert: insert into booking (start_time, end_time, time_flag, instrument_id, booking_pid,application_id, booking_person, booking_phone, create_time) values (#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{timeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instrumentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookingPid,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{applicationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{bookingPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookingPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now())
mapper.update: update booking set start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, time_flag = #{timeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, booking_pid = #{bookingPid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, application_id = #{applicationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, booking_person = #{bookingPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, booking_phone = #{bookingPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, start_time, end_time, time_flag, booking_pid,application_id, booking_person, booking_phone, create_time, instrument_id from booking where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, start_time, end_time, time_flag, booking_pid,application_id, booking_person, booking_phone, create_time, instrument_id from booking
select id, start_time, end_time, time_flag, booking_pid,application_id, booking_person, booking_phone,create_time, instrument_id from booking WHERE application_id = #{applicationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
